meanings.definition: A king or prince in India.
meanings.sent1: In ancient India, the rajahs ruled over their kingdoms with wisdom and strength.
meanings.sent2: The rajahs of old were respected leaders in their communities.
meanings.sent3: The rajahs decided to have a race to see who could ride an elephant the fastest!
meanings.sent4: The rajahs stood tall like mighty oak trees in the forest of royalty.
meanings.sent5: The image of the rajahs adorned the walls of the palace, a symbol of power and tradition.

meanings.definition: A ruler or chief in Malaysia.
meanings.sent1: The rajahs of Malaysia were known for their fair judgments and kindness towards their people.
meanings.sent2: Local rajahs often settled disputes among villagers in a peaceful manner.
meanings.sent3: One day, the rajahs decided to have a friendly fishing competition in the village pond.
meanings.sent4: The rajahs' influence spread across the land like ripples in a calm lake.
meanings.sent5: The colorful attire of the rajahs brightened up the village square, a sight to behold for all.

meanings.definition: The title of a Hindu prince or king in India.
meanings.sent1: The title of rajahs was passed down through generations in the royal family.
meanings.sent2: During ceremonies, the rajahs wore elaborate traditional garments.
meanings.sent3: The rajahs decided to have a dance-off to determine who was the most graceful ruler.
meanings.sent4: The golden crown of the rajahs shone like the sun on a clear day.
meanings.sent5: The stories of the rajahs' bravery were told by storytellers around the village campfire.
